dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3307 IH: School Lunch Affordability Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Hartzler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act by repealing the paid lunch equity requirements.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the School Lunch Affordability Act.
Subsection (p) of section 12 of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1760) is repealed.
